backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining storage mixins and data models for users, posts, stories, messages, notifications, and announcements with helpers for timestamps and role checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing recent frontend changes related to actor initialization fixes and routing updates.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files describing UI behavior, components, hooks, and page logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH theme variables for light and dark modes with global background/foreground setup.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration and app bootstrap logic using patched actors, startup phases, and authenticated route handling.
frontend/src/components/announcements/An: UI banner fetching and displaying the latest announcement inside a styled GlassCard.
frontend/src/components/posts/CommentsDr: Drawer UI for viewing and adding comments to a post with author lookup, formatting, and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/posts/CreatePost: Dialog for creating posts with text and optional media upload, including previews and upload progress.
Floating action button that triggers the create-post dialog.
frontend/src/components/posts/FeedList.t: Fetches and displays the feed of posts with loading, error, empty states, and manual refresh.
Displays image or video media with loading skeletons and auto-play controls for videos.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders an individual post with author info, likes, delete controls, media, and comments drawer.
frontend/src/components/posts/TrendingPo: Empty placeholder component for trending posts.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Dialog for editing user profile fields and uploading a new profile picture with progress.
frontend/src/components/stories/CreateSt: Dialog for creating a story with caption text and optional image upload and preview.
frontend/src/components/stories/StoriesR: Displays story bubbles grouped by author and includes a create-story button with dialog handling.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: A React error boundary that shows a styled fallback UI and resets to home on error.
frontend/src/components/system/GlassSurf: Provides reusable glass-style surface wrappers with variant styling including a card version.
frontend/src/components/system/NavIcon.t: Renders an image icon with automatic fallback to Lucide icons when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/system/PageState: Defines loading, error, empty, and skeleton UI states for pages and cards.
frontend/src/components/system/PageTrans: Wraps pages with a fade-in animation keyed to the current route.
frontend/src/components/system/RoleBadge: Displays styled badges for admin or owner roles using icon indicators.
frontend/src/components/system/SplashScr: Shows an animated startup splash screen with logo and branding.
frontend/src/components/system/StartupSc: Displays startup phase progress or an error screen with retry during app initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading stored identities, and login/logout methods.
frontend/src/hooks/usePatchedActor.ts: Creates a backend actor without access-control initialization and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, posts, admin actions, and various backend data via a patched actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS with a dark glassmorphism theme, custom variables, and gradient-based utility classes.
frontend/src/layout/AppShell.tsx: Implements the main app layout with navigation, user profile data, unread notifications, and periodic last‑seen updates.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, providing React Query and Internet Identity context providers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard page that displays stats, manages users and posts, and allows creating announcements.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AuthGate.tsx: Determines whether to show login, signup, or profile setup based on identity and user profile status.
frontend/src/pages/auth/LoginPage.tsx: Login page that authenticates the user via Internet Identity and provides UI for switching to signup.
frontend/src/pages/auth/ProfileSetupPage: Form page for creating a user profile with validation and backend signup request.
frontend/src/pages/auth/SignupPage.tsx: Signup screen using Internet Identity login with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/home/HomePage.tsx: Home feed showing posts and a button to open the create-post dialog.
frontend/src/pages/messages/Conversation: Conversation view displaying messages, sending new messages, and marking received messages as read.
frontend/src/pages/messages/MessagesPage: Lists all conversations with previews and links to individual message threads.
frontend/src/pages/notifications/Notific: Displays notifications with timestamps and marks unread items as read on click.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/Onboarding: Multi-step onboarding slides with navigation and a final completion handler.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfilePage.t: Displays a user profile with avatar, role badge, bio, posts, and edit or message actions, loading states, and not-found handling.
frontend/src/pages/search/SearchPage.tsx: Provides a debounced student search UI with results, loading skeletons, navigation to profiles, and quick messaging.
frontend/src/pages/settings/SettingsPage: Renders user settings including profile info, theme switching, logout, and admin role management for eligible users.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoriesPage.t: Shows a grid of active stories, allows creating new stories, and links to individual story viewers with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/stories/StoryViewerPa: Displays full-screen story viewer with progress bars, author info, auto‑advance, and navigation between stories.
frontend/src/utils/onboarding.ts: Handles reading and writing onboarding completion state from localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/startup.ts: Provides startup-phase logging plus utilities for timeouts, promise racing, and structured startup error reporting.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Formats timestamps for stories and user activity, including relative times and online-status checks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Describes project state and notes a startup hang caused by a missing backend method call.
